title: The Perfect Date
description: Tired of being single at thirty, journalist Kate Anderson is persuaded to join a dating site by her three best friends. Before she can find out if he is, her whole life is turned upside down and she's thrown into a world where no one is who they should be. Can she keep her head without losing her heart?http://www.amazon.co.uk/The-Perfect-D...
